name: Improved Dirty Trick
description: You are skilled at pulling dirty tricks on your foes.
benefit: You do not provoke an attack of opportunity when performing a dirty trick combat maneuver. In addition, you receive a +2 bonus on checks made to attempt a dirty trick. You also receive a +2 bonus to your Combat Maneuver Defense when an opponent tries a dirty trick on you.
normal: You provoke an attack of opportunity when performing a dirty trick combat maneuver.
staminaText: You can select this feat even if you don’t meet the ability score prerequisite (Intelligence 13). You gain the benefits of this feat only as long as you have at least 1 stamina point in your stamina pool. When you are the target of a dirty trick<sup>APG</sup> combat maneuver, you can spend a number of stamina points up to your Strength or Dexterity bonus, whichever is greater. Your CMD against that dirty trick attempt increases by that number.
mythicDescription: You’re a paragon of down-and-dirty fighting.
mythicBenefit: You gain a bonus equal to half your tier on checks to attempt a dirty trick, and to your CMD when an opponent attempts to perform a dirty trick on you. These bonuses stack with those granted by Improved Dirty Trick.
